usefulItems: jug, baking paper, bowl, serving plate
title: Fennel, asparagus and camembert salad

ingredients.content: 2 bunches asparagus, trimmed and cut into pieces (3 cm)
2 fennel bulbs, cut into very thin slices (see Tip),1 sprig fronds reserved for garnishing

preparations.content: Place all dressing ingredients into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a jug and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Make small cuts in Camembert and insert thyme leaves into cuts. Wrap in a piece of baking paper, then place into Varoma dish. Arrange asparagus around cheese, then season with salt and pepper.

Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10-12 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> or until asparagus is just cooked and cheese is soft . Remove Varoma and transfer asparagus into a bowl. Add 2 tablespoons of the reserved dressing and toss to coat.

To serve, arrange fennel, rocket, olives and reserved asparagus onto a serving plate. Place Camembert on top and garnish with reserved fennel fronds.  Drizzle with remaining dressing. Garnish with pine nuts and micro herbs (optional) just before serving.

hintsAndTricks: You can easily cut fennel into thin slices using a mandoline.
